programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne asks Reba to talk some sense into Van when he stops going to church, but when Reba's efforts fail, she takes her problem straight to the church's handsome new minister (Patrick Fabian).

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is disappointed when her plans for Halloween fall through because everyone in the family has other plans.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Realizing that his wife has gained quite a bit of weight, Brock consults Reba on how best to handle the delicate situation.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The family learns that Cheyenne no longer wishes to pursue a career in dentistry after she turns down Brock's offer to intern at his office; Barbara Jean is called for jury duty.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: A single mother (Nikki DeLoach) reinvents her struggling diner while spending time with a former high-school boyfriend (Andrew W. Walker) who's now a superstar baseball player.

programme.title: Hearts in the Game
programme.desc: Top New York City publicist Hazel Miller is tasked with spinning the image of MLB pitcher Diego Vasquez, who froze during Game 7 of the World Series. He also happens to be the guy who broke her heart in high school.

programme.title: Two Tickets to Paradise
programme.desc: When two weddings are ruined by both the bride and groom getting left at the altar, they still decide to take their honeymoons, not knowing they are heading to the same resort in Hawaii.

programme.title: Love, Fall & Order
programme.desc: A woman heads back to her hometown on a mission to help save her father's annual Fall Fest, which is held on her family's pumpkin farm.

programme.title: Winter Castle
programme.desc: Jenny feels an instant attraction to the handsome best man, Craig, at her sister's wedding. But her hopes of romance are quickly dashed when she is introduced to Craig's plus one, Lana.

programme.title: The Chicken Sisters
programme.desc: A final twist in the reality competition throws both the Mimi's and Frannie's crews for a loop; Frank Jr.'s true colors are revealed.

programme.title: The Real West
programme.desc: A family vacation to a working Ranch introduces Professor Rebecca to Jake West. Rebecca is a widower chasing tenure and Jake is a handsome cowboy who never settled down.

programme.desc: A miscommunication with her brother, Bryan, sends Barbra Jean to his place for Thanksgiving, while he goes to Reba's.

programme.desc: After observing their constant bickering in the office, Reba and Van's boss insists they see the company's occupational therapist.

programme.title: Reba

programme.desc: Sophia wants to wed Max Weinstock, her husband's partner.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia and Max return from their honeymoon and open a food stand on the boardwalk.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's tattered jacket, containing a winning lottery ticket, ends up in charity.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche learns that her brother is gay after he claims to have slept with Rose.

programme.title: Royal Hearts
programme.desc: Montana rancher Hank learns that he's the last heir of the late King of Merania and has inherited the throne. His daughter Kelly convinces the reluctant royal to step in as king so the country can keep its independence.

programme.title: Tulips in Spring
programme.desc: When a young interior designer learns her father has broken his leg, she rushes home to rural Washington because her help is desperately needed at the family tulip farm.

programme.title: Destination Wedding
programme.desc: Ellie has been painstakingly planning her sister Mandy's destination wedding for a very long time. When Mandy and her fiance don't show up, Ellie and her ex-boyfriend find themselves reconnecting while frantically trying to prevent a disaster.

programme.title: Harvest Love
programme.desc: A widowed surgeon visits her family's pear orchard in hopes of taking a break from her hectic life and reconnecting with her distant son. Once there, she begins to fall for the farm manager, Will, who is growing a new hybrid pear.

programme.title: Falling for Vermont
programme.desc: A best-selling author who got amnesia as the result of a car accident finds refuge with the local doctor of a small idyllic town in Vermont.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Space enthusiast Danielle has created a joyful life for her daughter Lucy, but lost sight of her own dreams along the way; with support from Connie Britton and the experts, she learns to accept help and reignite her passions.
